Definition: You will be shown a conversation between a user and system. Based on the conversation, identify who has spoken the indicated sentence.

Sentence3: Any sort of food would be fine, as long as it is a bit expensive. Could I get the phone number for your recommendation?Question: Who has spoken the sentence 2? (A) User (B) System

Could you help me find an Indian restaurant around there which serves Indian food, Sentence10: I am ok with either option. Choose one you think I would enjoy and let me know the address and postcode.
